date: Fri Jan 28 2022 20:58:12 GMT+1100 (Australian Eastern Daylight Time)
keywords: Nadal,Rafael Nadal,Berrettini,nadal australian open,nadal vs berrettini,nadal australian open 2022
description: After a six-month injury layoff Nadal's efficient attacking tennis has produced one of his most improbable runs to a grand slam final.
metaDescription: After a six-month injury layoff Nadal's efficient attacking tennis has produced one of his most improbable runs to a grand slam final.
topicText:
Rafael Nadal outplays Matteo Berrettini to reach sixth Australian ...
After a six-month injury layoff Nadal's efficient attacking tennis has produced one of his most improbable runs to a grand slam final.
Biggest of the Big Three? The incredible records Rafa can set in Aus ...
And if he defeats Stefanos Tstisipas or Daniil Medvedev on Sunday night at Melbourne Park, it'll also cap off a remarkable recovery from a career-threatening ...
Australian Open 2022: Rafael Nadal beats Berrettini to wins through ...
After a horror run of injury, the Spaniard says he never dreamt he'd have one more chance to win an Australian Open title.
Australian Open 2022 LIVE updates: Medvedev, Tsitsipas clash with ...
How tonight's semi-finalists match up ... Semi-final 2: Stefanos Tsitsipas v Daniil Medvedev, Rod Laver Arena, not before 7.30pm AEDT with the winner to play ...
Rafael Nadal Reaches Australian Open Final, Verge Of Grand Slam ...
Rafael Nadal poised to pull clear of Novak Djokovic and Roger Federer with a record 21st tennis major after beating Matteo Berrettini in Australian Open ...
Australian Open live updates: Medvedev and Tsitsipas do battle in ...
Stefanos Tsitsipas and Daniil Medvedev are battling to face Rafael Nadal in the Australian Open men's singles final. Follow live.
